Title: Buy Jindal Drilling and Industries; target of Rs 960: Anand Rathi
Source: Moneycontrol - News
Published: 2024-04-23 06:34
Related Stocks: RELIANCE
Categories: general

Summary:
Anand Rathi is bullish on Jindal Drilling and Industries has recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 960 in its research report dated April 22, 2024.

Sentiment: positive
